objects.name: Tote bag
objects.description: A small, black, canvas tote bag with a short shoulder strap.  It's fairly new and clean. It is slung over her left shoulder.

scenes.description: Alice stands on a quiet sidewalk. A few leaves are scattered on the ground. She smiles and looks to her right.The scene is set in the daytime, the sky is clear and mostly sunny, no shadows are noticeable, and the overall mood is peaceful.

characters.name: Alice
characters.description: A young woman, 5'5" tall, with a slender build. She has shoulder-length, wavy brown hair, fair skin, and bright, expressive eyes. She wears a simple, knee-length, dark gray A-line skirt, a white short sleeve shirt with a subtle floral pattern, black ankle boots, and no accessories.  She carries a small, black tote bag. She is smiling gently.

objects.description: A simple, light brown wooden park bench, moderately weathered. It sits below three nearly identical, somewhat sparsely leaved trees. Its placement and position are shown without too much details, suggesting a relatively ordinary environment, clean and uncluttered.

The flower, a single daisy with simple line details, rests beside her left foot at a quiet garden setting that's simple.
